name: Occupancy
query:
select name "Res ID:Link/Hotel Room Reservation:60", room "Room::60", item "Room Type::125", guest_name "Guest::150", from_date "From:Date:90", to_date "To:Date:90", status "Status::90", net_total "Net:Float:90", 0 "Advance:Float:90", customer "Customer:Link/Customer:120", room_status "Rm Status::90" 
from `tabHotel Room Reservation`
where 
1 = case 
when %(report)s = 'In House' and room_status='Checked In' then 1
when %(report)s = 'Arrival' and status in ('Booked','Advance Paid') and (room_status is null or room_status='Booked') then 1 
when %(report)s = 'Departure' and to_date=%(to_date)s and room_status = 'Checked In' then 1
when %(report)s = 'Checked Out' and from_date >= %(from_date)s and to_date <= %(to_date)s and room_status = 'Checked Out' then 1
else 0 end
